all-named-html-entities.description: List of all named HTML entities

array-group-str-omit-num-char.description: Groups array of strings by omitting number characters

array-of-arrays-into-ast.description: Turns an array of arrays of data into a nested tree of plain objects

array-of-arrays-sort-by-col.description: Sort array of arrays by column, rippling the sorting outwards from that column

arrayiffy-if-string.description: Put non-empty strings into arrays, turn empty-ones into empty arrays. Bypass everything else.

ast-compare.description: Compare anything: AST, objects, arrays, strings and nested thereof

ast-contains-only-empty-space.description: Does AST contain only empty space?

ast-deep-contains.description: Like t.same assert on array of objects, where element order doesn't matter.

ast-delete-object.description: Delete all plain objects in AST if they contain a certain key/value pair

ast-get-object.description: Getter/setter for nested parsed HTML AST's, querying objects by key/value pairs

ast-get-values-by-key.description: Extract values and paths from AST by keys OR set them by keys

ast-is-empty.description: Find out, is nested array/object/string/AST tree is empty

ast-loose-compare.description: Compare anything: AST, objects, arrays and strings

ast-monkey-traverse-with-lookahead.description: Utility library to traverse AST, reports upcoming values

ast-monkey-util.description: Utility library of AST helper functions

bitbucket-slug.description: Generate BitBucket readme header anchor slug URLs. Unofficial, covers whole ASCII and a bit beyond.

charcode-is-valid-xml-name-character.description: Does a given character belong to XML spec's "Production 4 OR 4a" type (is acceptable for XML element's name)

codsen-parser.description: Parser aiming at broken or mixed code, especially HTML & CSS

codsen-tokenizer.description: HTML and CSS lexer aimed at code with fatal errors, accepts mixed coding languages

color-shorthand-hex-to-six-digit.description: Convert shorthand hex color codes into full

csv-sort.description: Sorts double-entry bookkeeping CSV coming from internet banking

csv-sort-cli.description: Command line app to sort double-entry CSVs coming from internet banking statements

csv-split-easy.description: Splits the CSV string into array of arrays, each representing a row of columns

detect-is-it-html-or-xhtml.description: Answers, is the string input string more an HTML or XHTML (or neither)

detect-templating-language.description: Detects various templating languages present in string

easy-replace.description: Replace strings with optional lookarounds, but without regexes

edit-package-json.description: Edit package.json without parsing, as string, to keep the formatting intact

email-all-chars-within-ascii.description: Scans all characters within a string and checks are they within ASCII range

email-all-chars-within-ascii-cli.description: Command line app to scan email templates, are all their characters within ASCII range

email-comb.description: Remove unused CSS from email templates

email-homey.description: Generate homepage in the Browsersync root with links/screenshots to all your email templates

eslint-plugin-row-num.description: ESLint plugin to update row numbers on each console.log

eslint-plugin-test-num.description: ESLint plugin to update unit test numbers automatically

generate-atomic-css-cli.description: Generates and updates all HTML templates' atomic CSS

gulp-email-remove-unused-css.description: Gulp plugin to remove unused CSS classes/id's from styles in HTML HEAD and inline within BODY

helga.description: Your next best friend when editing complex nested code

html-all-known-attributes.description: All HTML attributes known to the Humanity

html-crush.description: Minifies HTML/CSS: valid or broken, pure or mixed with other languages

html-entities-not-email-friendly.description: All HTML entities which are not email template friendly

html-img-alt.description: Adds missing alt attributes to img tags. Non-parsing.

html-table-patcher.description: Visual helper to place templating code around table tags into correct places

is-char-suitable-for-html-attr-name.description: Is given character suitable to be in an HTML attribute's name?

is-html-attribute-closing.description: Is a character on a given index a closing of an HTML attribute?

is-html-tag-opening.description: Does an HTML tag start at given position?

is-language-code.description: Is given string a language code (as per IANA)

is-media-descriptor.description: Is given string a valid media descriptor (including media query)?

is-relative-uri.description: Is given string a relative URI?

js-row-num.description: Update all row numbers in all console.logs in JS code

js-row-num-cli.description: Update all row numbers in all console.logs in JS code

json-comb.description: Command line app to manage sets of JSON files

json-sort-cli.description: Command line app to deep sort JSON files, retains package.json special key order

json-variables.description: Resolves custom-marked, cross-referenced paths in parsed JSON

lerna-clean-changelogs.description: Removes frivolous entries from commitizen generated changelogs

lerna-clean-changelogs-cli.description: CLI application to cleanse the lerna/commitizen-generated changelogs

lerna-link-dep.description: Like lerna add but does just the symlinking, works on CLI bins too

line-column-mini.description: Convert string index to line-column position

object-all-values-equal-to.description: Does the AST/nested-plain-object/array/whatever contain only one kind of value?

object-boolean-combinations.description: Consumes a defaults object with booleans, generates all possible variations of it

object-delete-key.description: Delete keys from all arrays or plain objects, nested within anything, by key or by value or by both, and clean up afterwards. Accepts wildcards.

object-fill-missing-keys.description: Add missing keys into plain objects, according to a reference object

object-flatten-all-arrays.description: Merge and flatten any arrays found in all values within plain objects

object-flatten-referencing.description: Flatten complex nested objects according to a reference objects

object-merge-advanced.description: Recursively, deeply merge of anything (objects, arrays, strings or nested thereof), which weighs contents by type hierarchy to ensure the maximum content is retained

object-no-new-keys.description: Check, does a plain object (AST/JSON) has any unique keys, not present in a reference object (another AST/JSON)

object-set-all-values-to.description: Recursively walk the input and set all found values in plain objects to something

ranges-apply.description: Take an array of string index ranges, delete/replace the string according to them

ranges-crop.description: Crop array of ranges when they go beyond the reference string's length

ranges-ent-decode.description: Recursive HTML entity decoding for Ranges workflow

ranges-is-index-within.description: Checks if index is within any of the given string index ranges

ranges-iterate.description: Iterate a string and any changes within given string index ranges

ranges-merge.description: Merge and sort string index ranges

ranges-offset.description: Increment or decrement each index in every range

ranges-process-outside.description: Iterate string considering ranges, as if they were already applied

ranges-regex.description: Integrate regex operations into Ranges workflow

regex-empty-conditional-comments.description: Regular expression for matching HTML empty conditional comments

regex-is-jinja-nunjucks.description: Regular expression for detecting Jinja or Nunjucks code

regex-is-jsp.description: Regular expression for detecting JSP (Java Server Pages) code

regex-jinja-specific.description: Regular expression for detecting Python-specific Jinja code

str-indexes-of-plus.description: Like indexOf but returns array and counts per-grapheme

string-apostrophes.description: Comprehensive, HTML-entities-aware tool to typographically-correct the apostrophes and single/double quotes

string-character-is-astral-surrogate.description: Tells, is given character a part of astral character, specifically, a high and low surrogate

string-collapse-leading-whitespace.description: Collapse the leading and trailing whitespace of a string

string-collapse-white-space.description: Replace chunks of whitespace with a single spaces

string-convert-indexes.description: Convert between native JS string character indexes and grapheme-count-based indexes

string-extract-class-names.description: Extracts CSS class/id names from a string

string-extract-sass-vars.description: Parse SASS variables file into a plain object of CSS key-value pairs

string-find-heads-tails.description: Finds where are arbitrary templating marker heads and tails located

string-find-malformed.description: Search for a malformed string. Think of Levenshtein distance but in search.

string-fix-broken-named-entities.description: Finds and fixes common and not so common broken named HTML entities, returns ranges array of fixes

string-left-right.description: Looks up the first non-whitespace character to the left/right of a given index

string-match-left-right.description: Match substrings on the left or right of a given index, ignoring whitespace

string-overlap-one-on-another.description: Lay one string on top of another, with an optional offset

string-process-comma-separated.description: Extracts chunks from possibly comma or whatever-separated string

string-range-expander.description: Expands string index ranges within whitespace boundaries until letters are met

string-remove-duplicate-heads-tails.description: Detect and (recursively) remove head and tail wrappings around the input string

string-remove-thousand-separators.description: Detects and removes thousand separators (dot/comma/quote/space) from string-type digits

string-remove-widows.description: Helps to prevent widow words in a text

string-split-by-whitespace.description: Split string into array by chunks of whitespace

string-strip-html.description: Strips HTML tags from strings. No parser, accepts mixed sources.

string-trim-spaces-only.description: Like String.trim() but you can choose granularly what to trim

string-uglify.description: Shorten sets of strings deterministically, to be git-friendly

string-unfancy.description: Replace all n/m dashes, curly quotes with their simpler equivalents

stristri.description: Extracts or deletes HTML, CSS, text and/or templating tags from string

tap-parse-string-to-object.description: Parses raw Tap: string-to-object or stream-to-a-promise-of-an-object

test-mixer.description: Test helper to generate function opts object variations

update-versions.description: Like npm-check-updates but supports Lerna monorepos and enforces strict semver values

util-array-object-or-both.description: Validate and normalise user choice: array, object or both?

util-nonempty.description: Is the input (plain object, array, string or whatever) not empty?
